meanings.definition: A feeling of deep affection or fondness.
meanings.sent1: My dog always shows his luvs by wagging his tail when I come home.
meanings.sent2: She expresses her luvs for her family by giving them hugs and kisses.
meanings.sent3: The luvs between the puppy and the kitten was evident as they played together.
meanings.sent4: The luvs of a mother for her child knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The luvs shared between lifelong friends is a special bond.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present tense of the verb 'love'.
meanings.sent1: He luvs to spend time reading books in the library.
meanings.sent2: She luvs to bake cookies for her friends and family.
meanings.sent3: The cat luvs to nap in the warm sunbeam by the window.
meanings.sent4: The child luvs to play with their favorite toy all day long.
meanings.sent5: The bird luvs to sing its melodious song in the morning.

meanings.sent1: I prefer using Luvs diapers for my baby because they are gentle on the skin.
meanings.sent2: She stocked up on Luvs diapers before the baby arrived.
meanings.sent3: The Luvs diapers kept the baby dry and comfortable all night.
meanings.sent4: The Luvs diapers have cute designs that make changing time fun.
meanings.sent5: The Luvs diapers are a lifesaver for busy parents on the go.
